row1: In the first post of a friend who signed up with a referral link
row2: In every submission of a friend who is a member with a referral link
row5: In the first post of a friend who signed up with a referral link
row7: cargo balance for both you and your friend when your friend makes the first shipment
row8: A 2.5% cargo balance over the shipping cost from your friend's postings after registration
